data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has submitted the Exchange a copy Srutinizers report of  Extraordinary General Meeting held on February 04, 2026. Further, the company has informed the Exchange regarding voting results.

data.caption: Corrigendum
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Corrigendum to Notice of Extra Ordinary General Meeting to be held on February 04, 2026

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Shareholders meeting
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding Notice of Extraordinary General Meeting to be held on February 04, 2026

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange about submission of Revised Update -Acquisition of 66.09% Stake by Beta Drugs Limited in Nivian Lifesciences Private Limited.

data.caption: General Updates
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange about the acquisition of 66.09% stake in Nivian Lifesciences Private Limited.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding  Board meeting held on January 09, 2026.

data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding ''.the Board meeting to be held on Friday, the 9th day of January, 2026 at the corporate  office of the Company situated at SCO 184, Sector-5, Panchkula-134114 to, inter alia, consider and approve the:- (a) acquisition of equity shares of a target company from certain shareholders of the target company; (b) issue certain equity shares to the shareholders of the target company on a preferential basis through the private placement route, as consideration other than cash in lieu of the acquired shares and(c) to consider and approve the Employee Stock Option Plan (ESOP).

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Beta Drugs Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015
